```{r}
head(iris)

iris_pca <- prcomp(log(iris[1:4]), center = TRUE, scale. = TRUE) 

iris_pca

summary(iris_pca)

# PC's 
head(iris_pca$x)

#devtools::install_github("vqv/ggbiplot")
library(ggbiplot)

ggbiplot(iris_pca, obs.scale = 1, var.scale = 1, groups = iris$Species, 
         ellipse = TRUE, circle = TRUE) + 
  scale_color_discrete(name = '')
```
